member.name: M:RedCow.Generators.BaseGenerator.GenerateAsync(CodeGeneration.Roslyn.TransformationContext,System.IProgress{Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Create the syntax tree representing the expansion of some member to which this attribute is applied.
member.param: All the inputs necessary to perform the code generation.
A way to report diagnostic messages.
member.returns: The generated member syntax to be added to the project.

member.param: All the inputs necessary to perform the code generation.
A way to report diagnostic messages.
member.returns: The generated syntax nodes to be added to the compilation unit added to the project.
